name: youtube-auto-video-generator
description: AWS ネイティブ構成を使った YouTube 自動動画生成パイプライン

scripts.build: npm run build:infrastructure && npm run build:functions
scripts.build:functions:all: for dir in src/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm install && npm run build 2>/dev/null || true); done
scripts.deploy:dev: cd infrastructure && npm run deploy -- --profile dev
scripts.deploy:prod: cd infrastructure && npm run deploy -- --profile prod
scripts.test: npm run test:infrastructure && npm run test:functions
scripts.clean: npm run clean:infrastructure && npm run clean:functions
scripts.clean:functions: find src -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true; find src -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
